name: Beautiful memories in BKK on camera with ur guide Charlie
description: What's special is that I am an American-born that is also genuine Thai blood living here in Thailand. I'm good at doing wedding shoots, so if you are a couple or a family who just loves getting professional photos of yourselves, I'm your guy. I also can teach photography to newbies on how to take better photos. Lastly, I can teach you some Thai language while I'm with you.
